## Overview
This project visualizes the spread of COVID-19 within the contiguous United States. The animation begins on 1/21/2020 and updates weekly through 4/21/20. 

Use citation inserts like this[^filler].

## Data Description
The data for this visualization comes from a [NY Times COVID-19 dataset](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nytimes/covid-19-data/master/us-counties.csv) and a [NY Times US Counties dataset](https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=53935d5d1c8540539d290072fcda77c1).

These two datasets can be merged together through their shared FIPS IDs, resulting in the table used for the visualization.
